content: this legal case involves two parties referred to as petitioner bl and counterparty av they both claimed a 12 coownership share of a property the municipal court split in croatia decided to dissolve the coownership and ordered a public auction for the sale of the property the proceeds from the sale will be distributed based on the ownership shares of the parties the property includes a land a house with multiple floors a landscaped courtyard and a parking area the parties have agreed to terminate their coownership according to the real estate ownership real rights act the properties are registered in the land registry of the cadastral municipality the termination will be carried out through a civil division process
